name: Keep it afloat
description:
A pirate rhythm game made with godot for the ludum dare 46.
Takes place in a singular "puppet show" setting, stay in rhythm and let your crew sing as you give them orders !
Try to reach as far as you can, tell us how far you've gone !

How to play:

  • Beat the Pam and Boom to command your crew.
  • Play an order and let your sailors respond, so they do the action.
  • Advance further and further to meet more enemies and eliminate the terrible kraken! Yoo-Hoo!
